fact-503.value: registered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, Section B, Insert 18161.

fact-508.value: The principal activity of the Group is the operation of lotteries and other gaming activities in accordance with applicable legislation, i.e. the operation of instant and numerical lotteries, casinos, sports and odds betting and other similar games.In addition to lottery and betting activities, the Group also engages in certain non-lottery business activities through its points of sale and terminals (e.g. telecommunication and payment services).
